website_summaries.verdict: A popular, mid-priced bouncer with a few minor consumer concerns.
cons: Occasional complaints about quality of music and toy bar

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The bounce is really great! It works really well for my 13 lb baby. My only complaint is that it turns off after 30 min and in order to start it again, you have to push the buttons that are loud... which wakes up my baby. All in all though, it’s a pretty cool bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: A staple and a must have
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this bouncer! This is the place to set down my child when we are in the living room and I need to put on my nursing pillow or use the bathroom quickly. This is definitely a staple in our house. When she was newly born she really enjoyed the little lion and owl on the mobile bar. It's definitely lacking color but is it keep her attention and I like that it's not crazy wild colors.
customer_reviews.author: KaiNai02

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bounce well
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It hardly bounces at all, which renders it useless as an automatic bouncer. I have an 11 lb infant, so it's not like he's too heavy for it. The only reason I gave it 2 stars is because the fabric was extremely soft.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies the don’t like vibration!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bouncer. Like the other reviews say, it bounces like the motion you would make while holding them. If they kick it bounces more, but it’s gentle enough to rock them to sleep if they’re relaxed. Unlike my other boys, he doesn’t seem to care for a vibrating chair, and his big swing doesn’t captivate him either. This is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Literally within seconds of placing our fussy two month old in this, he instantly settled down and was content - and I didn't even install the batteries yet. The liner material is soft and padded and the assembly was super easy. It feels sturdy and put together well, but simple enough to take apart with ease. The bouncer is virtually silent as well so no worries about noisy hardware waking him up. The music/sounds are a nice touch, but we haven't really used them yet. Overall, this thing is amazing and I would recommend it to anyone looking for one.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Bright comfortable bouncer that actually bounces.
customer_reviews.text: This seat bounces nicely. My baby enjoys it. Bright and cheery colors just like what is pictured. The seat insert and head rest is really soft minky type material. The toy bar does unhook too easily in my opinion, but it stays put once it’s in place and I don’t think it would come off unless knocked pretty hard or grabbed; also, the toy bar is lightweight so I don’t think it really poses too much of a hazard even if it was knocked loose. If worried though, there’s no reason the toy bar couldn’t just be taken off and stored. This is a good solution if you want a bouncer that actually bounces and doesn’t just vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: CDRichards

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bouncer because my son loves to bounce and hates his swing. I thought an automatic bouncer would help keep him happy without me having to bounce it with my foot all day. Unfortunately this automatic bouncer is terrible! It does not bounce at all. I saw the video someone posted and it looked legit so ignored the bad reviews. I should have listened the the complaints about this thing cause they’re all correct! It doesn’t move at all. I still have to use my foot to bounce it, so what’s the point. Not worth the money. Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LoveLabradors

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the bounce on it is perfect. I did notice as my baby is getting heavier the bounce takes a bit longer to really start to bounce I have to help it out a bit but it works like a charm in the sense that my baby is comfortable in it, will be nice and calm even fall asleep for a good 30 min in it. Worth it in my opinion. Not too heavy. I've had it for about 3 months or so and have replaced the batteries once already
customer_reviews.author: Goasklui and Goasknick

customer_reviews.title: It's cute, but...
customer_reviews.text: The bouncing isn't nearly enough. I still have to bounce it myself, which makes completing other tasks almost impossible. The baby seems comfortable in it and it's really cute. All in all we don't hate it, but I probably wouldn't buy it again. It just doesn't do what we were hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: RaeW

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is a favorite in our household. The music is quite nice, and the automatic bouncing function has been invaluable for us. It doesn’t calm our baby if she’s already crying, but once we get her calm, it’s a great safe reclined place for us to put her where she will be comfortable and can watch mommy and daddy do chores and cook. She likes the music too!
customer_reviews.author: Bollingerlr

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Bounce is WEAK
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a nice bouncer. It looks far more comfortable and well put together than most. There is some really comfy padding that supports a newborn well. I recommend this if you don’t already have one. However, if you are getting it because it automatically bounces, beware! The bounce is super weak. It’s not even enough to keep my newborn asleep. It is also nearly impossible to disassemble to send back. We ended up keeping it even though we have two others and were only buying it for the automatic feature.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for clingy babies
customer_reviews.text: This works well for us to keep baby distracted while I cook or eat. The arch came assembled backwards (with animals facing out), but it wasn't anything dad couldn't fix with a screwdriver. The animals are out of reach of our 17 lbs 4 months old, so I hung another toy off one of them, so he could play. I think he's close to the weight limit of this thing now, as he's pretty much horizontal when in it, it's more of a hammock now. Still works though.
customer_reviews.author: oplap

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, but Very Weak Bounce
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer has several great features, but the main feature we got it for (the automatic bouncer) isn't that good. Even on the highest setting, it barely bounces. It's not enough to even calm my infant, much less help her fall asleep. And when we want to bounce her manually (with a foot on the side of the bouncer), we have to remove the battery/control compartment on the back; otherwisenit makes a really loud clicking noise. So we just use it as a regular bouncer. It works fine for that, but it's not worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaCKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Our daughters favorite hangout!
customer_reviews.text: After using my friends bouncer (this same one) while we were out of town we decided to order one for our little girl. She absolutely loves it. She bounces herself around in it and loves the music it plays. It's soft and the seat sinks in perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.text: 3mo loves it. We’ve lovingly dubbed it the pooping chair! Helps when it’s time to go and she’s having trouble. She also loves the little toys on the toy bar. Only thing that’s a little weird is the toys on the bar face the wrong way but she doesn’t mind (see picture). I move it from room to room to get things done and she’s not mad about it! As far as the bounce... it’s very gentle. If you’re looking for a strong movement then this will not be what you’re looking for. This is the only bouncer that I found that bounces itself. Also, most bouncers have vibration feature, but this one doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flores

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bouncer. I love that it has the feature that it can bounce on it own with a push of a button. (C batteries aren’t includes) My 6 week old loves it and fits comfortably in it. The bar with toys can move back and forth to adjust to your liking or where you would like your baby to have a better view of the toys. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Mobile is a pain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bouncer because it is self bouncing, had nature sounds/music, and I liked the design. Honestly I haven’t used it much since bringing my baby home because the mobile is constantly falling off and ridiculous hard to put back. Also the highest bounce setting (There’s only two settings) is extremely soft and I’m not sure my baby feels it. This bouncer doesn’t really smooth or entertain her one bit. Every child is different so this might be perfect for others.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Great, when it works!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it (and so did my LO), but I have two complaints. 1. The motor burnt out. She’s barely 4 months old and we did not use it THAT much for the motor to burn out. The batteries are new, the sound will still play, and the bouncer light “shows” that it’s on, but no movement. 2. The arch toy comes off TOO easy. I wish it could pop on and off - but when you go back too far, it comes completely off. It’s not the easiest to put back on (you have to line it up perfect on both sides). The toys also gave away from the LO. Which I don’t understand. I am so sad.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncy seat is great! My favorite feature is that it bounces by itself. it doesn't bounce too hard or too soft it seems just right for my baby. This bouncy seat has been a lifesaver. It's the only way I can get anything done around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Bouncing motion not for all babies
customer_reviews.text: Well made with the exception of the toy bar. It doesn't lock in place so if you accidentally put up at all while adjusting it it will disconnect but it's easy to put back on. The bouncing motion isn't for all babies I've discovered. My lo spits up after about 10 mins each time I've tried it with the bouncer turned on. It keeps him at a comfortable angle though and is nice and soft. So even though I'm not bouncing feature, for me it's still worth the price. Plus no sharp edges for baby to get cut on.
customer_reviews.author: Hart

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really good at putting things together. So my father put it together and he didnt have any trouble at all. My baby is really spoiled so he won't stay in the bouncer for long periods. but he does like it for 10 - 15 mins depending on if he gets hicxups or not. I love that you don't manually have to bounce it. This product does it on its own and its so convenient to take around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This product has literally saved my life. Baby sleeps in here through the night and she loves it. I always read the reviews and lots of people said it doesn’t bounce much, but it does. You can always bounce it yourself if you want it to go faster. Not every baby likes bouncers, but if yours does, this automatic one is a LIFESAVER.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing for the good

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer. really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.text: There were Quite a bit bad reviews. But I personally love this baby bouncer, yes the automatic bouncer is not that strong but I don’t think it really needs to be, as baby moves it will bounce as well so I don’t really see a problem with that. It’s super cute and easy to put together as well as soft and washable. my baby loves it so I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: A&GT

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love and clearly my husband is also
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love and clearly my husband is also. I had my baby a few days ago and we started using this almost immediately, mostly for the automatic bouncing feature. This bouncer is THE BEST! Baby just sits there quietly and she is bounced to sleep. Clearly, she loves it also. I like the deep seat which looks like it is cuddling baby. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and started using this product and we Love it. I bought it because my daughter loves to be lighting bounced to get to sleep, which is very tiring for us to do 8 times a day, not to mention very time consuming. So far the smartbounce is perfect to keep her bouncing and keeping me free to get things done around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for new moms!!!
customer_reviews.text: This automatic bouncer is AWESOME!! It has saved my leg from bouncing the non automatic one!! My newborn loves it, only way she will nap and it's so soft!!
customer_reviews.author: Rheanne Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Ok bouncer... quality not that enduring.
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for first few months. After 5 months the leg snapped with my daughter in it and the automatic bouncing part got weak barely moving her and she's a little baby 8 months at 14.15 pounds. Bought a replacement made by same company that has the bouncer mechanism in the front and she loves it. Similar to car movements more of a jiggling bump than full bounce but as long as she likes it.... seems to eat less batteries as well. Update* contacted kids ll and they are sending a replacement bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hands free bouncing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Saves me from having to sit right next to my little one and bounce him all the time! If your baby loves their bouncer seat and your looking for a way to get things done while they can be bounced happily hands free this is for you! I was concerned it wouldn't bounce hard enough but as long as it's on double green I think it bounces just enough to keep my little one happy
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Luecken

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bouncer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer seat is the perfect way to "gently" rock your new baby. Some reviews mention it being too slow, however, I would never place may child in something that rocks aggressively. The soft bounce is developmentally appropriate for their developing brains and works with ease to quietly soothe my baby to sleep. I'll be buying these as shower gifts for all my future moms!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but we must have got a bad one...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our month old baby. Assembly was easy. Product looks great. Worked for 2 days then quit working. Amazon said we could disassemble, box up, and ship back. I took it apart and found that one of the power wires on the circuit board had came loose. I was able to resolder the wire back. Love the product, but any brand new product, especially one that has motion/movement, should last more than two days. Kinda bummed that we paid so much and I still had to fix it. We just didn’t want the hassle of going through the trouble of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad R, Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Good for 3 months and up.
customer_reviews.text: Great! However if you have a tiny baby this won’t be convenient for a couple months till they gain some weight. My baby is 8 pounds and isn’t heavy enough for the automatic Bouncer to work. It’s too much of an incline for her age, her little neck flops forward. I had this same bouncer with my first babe and once he hit 3 months, this was a life saver and use it till it broke ha!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Barely bounces.
customer_reviews.text: The colors are cute, but this thing BARELY moves. It’s pretty useless as a bouncer. Assembly was simple enough even tho the instructions are not great.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney Durbin

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Bounces by itself. Cons: 1. Top heavy when moving. 2. The overhead thing does not stay on well at all. I feel I’m always reattaching it. 3. The battery machine does not come off easily. It has to come off in order to take the seat off to wash. 4. wish it vibrated also. Overall: Ok, but wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smart Bouncer is not so intelligent after all!!!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the item is less then expected! For my 3 month old infant he enjoyed a similar SmartBounce manufactured by Grace, which my sister had for her grandchildren when we visited. So we went ahead and knew it was time to purchase one but we could not find the identical Graco infant bouncer seat. Instead we bought this version and now regret our purchase as the bouncer barley moves aka our son has to bounced manually and we could have saved money if I realized this to begin with or just found a different manufacturer as this one was a waste of $20 extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B

customer_reviews.title: This is it!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my second baby and loved it. I read a lot of comments said it doesn’t automatically bounce, but mine bounces very well. It’s super soft. What I love about it the most is the control panel is above the head instead of around the legs. That way the baby won’t kick it even if he’s older and taller.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Wong

customer_reviews.title: Very safe, comfortable, and easy to manage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grandchildren. The motor on the rocker works intermittently so the rocking is more like a person doing it. Kids are very secure in it, and it's easy to carry and store. Looks very comfortable. Nice little bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I want to RETURN this bouncer or exchange!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked nice when assembled. It’s sturdy, nice color, etc. BUT it don’t even bounce! Other reviews have a video of it bouncing on its highest mode and mine is nothing compared to that. Video provided shows it’s highest speed. Bruh it’s not even moving. Other picture provided has scratches on the part where batteries go like it was used???? Maybe that’s why it don’t bounce?? idk. Lame as f...
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Barely bounces
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our son who LOVES being bounced in his bouncer seemingly 24/7. We wanted a break from constant bouncing. Only problem is this one bounces so lightly he doesn't like it. It seriously only gently moves a tiny bit with the bounces. He prefers the other bouncer we have.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves her bouncer! The only reason I got this was that it is the only product I found that can bounce itself...while this does do this with the box that attaches to the back, I feel it could use a little more bounce to it. It does not move the most, but the little one is happy with it compared to her regular bounder...so, so am I. Looks great and was pretty easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This does not bounce very hard
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have a baby in daycare that will only stop crying if he's bounced. I thought this was going to be the miracle my legs had prayed for. Well, I was wrong. Even on the high setting, it barely moves, and if the baby moves at all, it stops bouncing. Also, this doesn't have anything to do with the function of the seat, but if you notice in the pictures the little toys that hang down? They face out, so the person looking at the toys see the cute faces and details, but all baby sees is the white back. Nothing major, just a little detail that bothers me. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute colors. Seems cool
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product an all around 3 star rating because it seems veey cool and looks as though my daughter would enjoy it but it came with mis manufactured pieces. So we sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Raya Sassard

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: Our newborn son loves this bouncer. And, honestly, I dont know what I wouldve done without it. Our son refused to sleep in the bassinet we put in our bedroom. And, for the first 2 weeks, everytime we tried to put him in his crib he would wake up, refusing to sleep in it. This bouncer kept my husband & I sane until we could figure out a plan. Not only does it bounce steady enough to soothe a screaming infant, but it has served as a safe place for him to rest, giving Mommy's arms (and nerves) a break. This was a wonderful investment!!
customer_reviews.author: Fera

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this bouncer. My baby sleeps very comfortably in it, he loves it. I think it is worth the money and I would buy it again. The only negative thing that it consumes a lot of batteries. Otherwise, I like the automatic smooth bouncing and the coziness of this bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Fhaidar

customer_reviews.title: So far I’m in love
customer_reviews.text: For our first child we got a cheap hand me down bouncer, but since our second is coming along I wanted an upgrade! We swore by our bouncer and this one definitely delivers. Haven’t quiet figured out the ‘automatic bouncing’ part of it but we still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Toy bar does not stay on. Auto bouncing is ...
customer_reviews.text: Toy bar does not stay on. Auto bouncing is barely there. I have to manually bounce then once he’s asleep the auto bounce will keep him asleep for a while. Turns off way too soon and turning it back on will usually wake the baby. Too pricey for what you’re getting.
customer_reviews.author: APerry

customer_reviews.title: This has been awesome to have when I need to shower or work ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been awesome to have when I need to shower or work on my computer. But the bounce is very subtle so it keeps a relaxed baby happy however it's not aggressive enough to calm a pissed off baby.
customer_reviews.author: Tesia Webb

customer_reviews.title: If your baby likes to bounce it’s a must have
customer_reviews.text: My son does not like to swing But he loves to bounce. All the other bouncers I’ve seen you have to sit there and bounce them by hand. This one is so awesome because it bounces for you. I wish it bounced a little more but I’m sure because of safety reasons it bounces as much as they’ll allow. Overall really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: It bounces itself!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bouncer!! It’s the first time I’ve ever seen a bouncer that bounces itself. It’s stylish and not too “baby” if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: For babies that like to bounce.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves to bounced and I love that this bounces on its own. And you can still bounce it manual if you want. The only downfall is the timer is 30 minutes. Wish it had a longer time. But other then that, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dee/tony

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son grew out of the Rock n'Play fairly quickly, so this worked great as a replacement. His feet aren't constricted in length as they were in the Rock n' Play, in this they can hang out a little the more he grows.
customer_reviews.author: pattyoryan

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer! My son didn't like the vibrating one I had and would cry after only a few minutes of me setting him down, I needed something that bounces and relaxed him, and this finally did just that!! I can set him down and he loves the music he sits quietly starring at every thing for a half an hour if not longer here and there. I am so happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Arritt

customer_reviews.title: Great seat. Supportive, comfy, and my grand baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Supportive, comfy, and my grand baby loves it. There needs to be a better volume control for the sounds. It doesn't get loud enough for a fussy baby to hear. But overall a great seat.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Confette

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my house, Grandma, my daughter loved it for her newborn so much she took it home and I had to order another. It gently moves and has soft sound. She has 2 different brands at home, but liked this best.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: The bouncer mechanism is absolutely worthless on this product. ...
customer_reviews.text: The bouncer mechanism is absolutely worthless on this product. I’m not saying I want to bounce my child to Pluto but when his movements in the bouncer at 7 weeks old are twice that of the bouncer it leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Willylaboy

customer_reviews.title: FAULTY UNIT BEFORE FAMILY TRIP!
customer_reviews.text: I called customer service because of the vibration unit was not working, they agreed to replace it in aprox. 10 days. The bad part of this is that We are leaving on family trip, and We wont get the replacement on time. Its really bad they don't test units before sending them to customers. Now lets see how We can keep the baby calmed.
customer_reviews.author: harry alvarez

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: The bounce on this is SO weak. When my daughter was a newborn I assumed the rocking mechanism needed more weight to create a deeper bouncing movement with. As she got older and heavier, the bounces didn't get any stronger. Overall the product is nicely decorated and built well, but do your research and find something with a rocking mechanism that can actually soothe a baby-because this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela.MT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bounce really well
customer_reviews.text: HATE THAT IT DOESNT BOUNCE HARDER! It barely moves. That needs to be fixed NOW! I'm only giving it a 3 cause I do like that it's longer and my child doesn't hit feet on the bottom and once she's asleep it helps keep asleep sometimes
customer_reviews.author: A. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is awesome! I bought one at Target before my son was born and it's great. It bounces on its own and plays different music. My son loves it so much that I ordered another one on Amazon for my mom's house. I wish the chair also vibrated but the rocking seems to be enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: SKnight

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: This is the first one I bought off of Amazon but the 3rd one total. The box is very damaged so I will just buy from the store from now on. It will be a baby shower gift that I will have to assemble or something other than leaving it in the box it came in. I love these bouncers because they are quiet, bounce alone, and play music as well as soothing sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bounce
customer_reviews.text: Love this bouncer, it was super easy to put together. I hate that it takes 3 C batteries but other then that everything is awesome about it. The seat is super soft. And the bounce is perfect, not to fast and not to slow.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Ingenuity Bouncer works
customer_reviews.text: The bouncer was easy to assembly/install. The soothing music and bouncing action work ... our 4 month old baby goes to sleep and/or stops crying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The design is really cute and it actually bounces on its own without having to manually bounce it. The only bouncer that actually has put my baby to sleep. He only wants to be carried so this is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best seat we’ve had
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids love this seat! We decided to buy a second seat to have one downstairs and one upstairs because baby loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Gretta

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bouncer. You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this bouncer more. It is A LOT cheaper than buying a swing and yet has the same effect. Instead of vibrating like all the other lame bouncers, this one literally bounces in the same rhythm that every mom tries when trying to get their baby to sleep. It works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rose

customer_reviews.title: Horrible bouncer
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 7lbs and as soon as I put her in it it stops bouncing. Even without the baby in it it barely bounces. Don’t waste your money go with a name brand one that is like $10 more. I will be returning this ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Brianna P

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Best bouncer ever! This is my second one, first one was gifted at my first baby shower, and my baby used till she was 2 years old and bounced till it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ree or Bree

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Upset i spent the money i did on this. The overhang comes off to the touch, hard to move around from place to place. Wish it had a vibrating option. Honestly the cheaper regular bouncers that play music and vibrate are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Guertin

customer_reviews.title: support is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these both of my daughters was due within a week of each other... Now babies are here 1 is 1 month the other 3 weeks and 1 of these DOES NOT WORK... I called for support and NOTHING has been done but a report... Hello the baby will grow out of this before they make it right!
customer_reviews.author: Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: Different than expect
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt bounce as hard as my son likes, but he lives in the bouncer now, it's his favorite place to nap. I would havr lost my mind without it. Little hard to move around in narrow places though with how wide the bottom is.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money... coming from a mom of 4
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write bad reviews, but I think this one will save some new parents some money. I have had 3 kids prior to my 4 month old, so I’ve had a few bouncers. This one seemed like a good idea because of it being automatic, but I have to say it was NOT. The hanging toys are so hard to put on and they fall off really easy. It almost fell on my baby several times. I tried really hard to love it, but I don’t have the time to mess with a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really bounce
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn’t bounce very well. I don’t know why but it just goes up and down so softly you can barely tell it’s moving at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, the only style bouncer my baby likes so far. The bounce isn’t as much as I thought, it’s pretty subtle but my baby enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerissa

customer_reviews.title: Stable...comfy ..rocks slow and steady
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy with results for an infant. Baby is now 13 lbs and still room to grow in the unit. Bought a second for next grand child.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Sadly It’s the Only Option for An Automatic Bouncer Out There
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent automatic bouncer but the timing feature is super annoying. My baby will doze off and after 20 minutes the bouncing turns off. The button to turn it back on is weirdly loud so it always scares my poor baby. Oh and if it turns off after 20 minutes and you don’t start it again...be sure to turn it off completely because if not you’ll be going through batteries like crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Wish the arch didn't move back so easily and I wish it was attached better, it pops off almost every time I go to pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: JWinginIt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Save your time and effort and do not buy this. I’ve literally never written a review before but I was so disappointed in this product that I had to. The bounce is so light that it’s pointless. It’s should not even be called an automatic bouncer. Now I have to take it all apart and return. The only perk is that it wasn’t hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bouncer broke while my baby was on it:
customer_reviews.text: Couple of things o like about the bouncer is that the music is soothing for my baby. She love to sleep on this bouncer. But I hate that it broke on my baby, she was taking her nap while I was bouncing her to sleep but it scared me when I saw one side down I quickly unbuckled her, check for any injury, thanks God she was fine. The bouncer wire was in two pieces, the sad thing is that my baby is won't be able to use it anymore. And is not the weight bc she's 17 pounds that's why I feel that she love it bc she perfectly cuddle on it.
customer_reviews.author: estrada medarda

customer_reviews.title: i love this product!
customer_reviews.text: We use this everyday when we are lounging around. Sometimes my little one falls asleep in it too! I love that this bounces on its own. It’s brilliant! Very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the seat is great, love that it bounces on its own - ...
customer_reviews.text: The toy bar broke before my daughter even got to use it. Other than that the seat is great, love that it bounces on its own - that's been fantastic when she was too little to rock. The music seems like it's a little too loud, so we don't use that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It's soft and beautiful, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is much prettier in person. It's soft and beautiful, well made, sturdy. The music is great and I'm excited to put baby in it. I bought more toys to put on top so she'd have something visually stimulating to look at and hopefully play with afer her motor skills develop further. I would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bouncer; good quality, easy to put together, pretty. However, I am VERY disappointed with its “bouncing” ability. It barely moves. It does not vibrate either. If I hadn’t already put it all together I Had my daughter try it out I would return this. I was hoping for more of a bouncing option rather than one that barely even moves. Her swinging her arms makes it move more than the bouncer part does.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too soft for the support
customer_reviews.text: My baby girls neck bends too much because it’s so soft and doesn’t hear enough support. It worries me that this is a design defect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, hanging toys keep falling
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair, as all the musical chairs the melodies are too loud, the only thing that I don’t like it is the detachable hanging toys first they are giving the back to my baby and the whole thing falls every time I try to move the chair
customer_reviews.author: Kristela Cedillos

customer_reviews.title: Spend money on a better brand
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time putting together, and then had issues with the bounce. The bounce is real subtle, and if the baby bounces her feet, it won’t auto bounce. But it is a comfy seat, a newborn will be too small for it. 2.5 months is when she started to fit seat better
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good bouncer! Wish it would bounce harder. Go through batteries like crazy and stays on for maybe 30 minutes. Buttons are super loud when you push them & will wake a sleeping baby
customer_reviews.author: Ken P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Item was great. It was a gift and they loved it. Would definitely order from them again. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Cindy F. Margolis

customer_reviews.title: Just cute, nothing much after that.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but that's all there is. It barely moves and it does not move like a mother. Unless you move your child up and down with one arm. 🤷🏽‍♀️ Is like a reclining chair.
customer_reviews.author: Yeidrys Amengual

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but the rocker part is VERY sensitive. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but the rocker part is VERY sensitive. I've already had to replace it once as it makes a weird clicking noise after a while of using. The new one I got is now doing the same so I may have to get it replaced AGAIN or just get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: To make life a little easier for busy moms
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my baby. We’ve always gotten her to sleep in the regular bouncer, but couldn’t keep her to sleep unless we kept boucing. This has been a LIFE CHANGER. We can enjoy dinner without having to worry about bouncing her for hours. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I set this up and put my son in it right away. My son fell asleep within 5 minutes!!! I like !!
customer_reviews.author: T.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Choose another bouncer
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to bounce automatically. The bounce, even on the high setting, is very low, and i end up having to bounce my daughter anyway. Also, the arc that holds the toys always comes off, even with the softest of touches. Placing it back on is also a pain and there is definitely a learning curve to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Love the up and down bounce. Had it shipped to the Airbnb we were staying in on vacation. Worked great for baby to have a seat and entertainment while not at home.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer is the weakest thing ever the lowest setting doesn’t do anything and the highest setting barely bounces idk if I got one that doesn’t work right but I’m highly disappointed. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone. And my baby hates the matching swing
customer_reviews.author: sherry carter

customer_reviews.title: Great color! Durable! And still works after 6months!!
customer_reviews.text: I scored them most 5 but my over all has to be a 4 star. Its a cute bouncer. Love the color. Been really durable. Weve had it 6 months now and it still works and my son is 6 months old and almost 20lbs. However the toys that hang on it. Or is suppose to hang on it didnt snap on right. It goes on and eventually falls off. Other then that I've never had a bouncer last as long and keep its bounce.. The company was prompt about picking order and shipping it out.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T.

customer_reviews.title: Stay FAAAR Away!!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your time. Trust me. This company has 1.8 stars out of 5 on facebook. They dont have quality control on ANY of their products. Plus they dont have replacement parts. Bought a swing a while ago from them, didnt work. Now, bought this, didnt work. Returned it, got another to see if it was fluke, nope. Doesnt work. I'm done with this brand. They suck!!! Stay far away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Khoury

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it so far. Very easy to move around from room to room (lightweight) but very sturdy. Had a bit of trouble setting up. Plastic piece in tube was bent. Had to break off and then tube eent in smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Safe place for baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little comfortable safe place for a newborn and up. You can move it from room to room quick access in and out of bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing bouncer! My baby absolutely loves it! It’s got great bounce! I love the timeout feature, but I also wish it could be turned off so I don’t have to reset it every 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t what I expected and didn’t bounce so well I do have a swing and that’s ok too.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Was missing parts and the company wouldn't send replacements so ended up returning. Looked nice and soft.. if all the pieces had arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Zoran Jagrovic

product_meta.title: Ingenuity Smartbounce Automatic Bouncer Piper
product_meta.description: Color:PiperHey Mom, if you could use a few extra hands-free moments in your day? The SmartBounce Automatic Bouncer from Ingenuity bounces all by itself, mimicking mom's natural motion for up to 30 minutes of uninterrupted bouncing. With 2 speeds to choose from, you can choose the bounce speed that baby prefers most. Eight melodies and 3 soothing nature sounds, along with a removable, toybar featuring 2 plush toys that pivots easily out of the way. Patented Hybridrive technology means batteries will last twice as long as traditional bouncers. The cradling seat and removable head support are adorned with Piper fashion which will tastefully complement your home decor. 3-point harness, non-slip feet and machine-washable seat pad make this bouncer as must-have. Designed with parenthood in mind.. Fabric Care Instructions- Seat pad is machine-washable, Toys/Frame are wipe clean
feature_bullets: 30 minutes of continuous automatic bouncing: mimics mom's natural motion
2-speed variable bounce provides options for either a subtle or more pronounced bounce
Cradling seat with removable head support and bolster
Removable, pivoting toy bar with 2 plush toys Features Hybridrive technology so batteries last twice as long as traditional bouncers3 point harness; Non-slip feet

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,353 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
